ai-patthana23.24:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.24:0.3_0: Talking on the skillful, undertook overestimation,
ai-patthana23.24:1.1_0: or placing the mind and keeping it connected are skillful. Mindfulness arises without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-patthana23.24:1.1_2: that’s not the fifteenth day sabbath.
ai-patthana23.24:2.1_0: nor placing the mind and keeping it connected are without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Misconduct is a cause or reason.
ai-patthana23.24:3.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness arises dependent on the teaching, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-patthana23.24:3.1_2: There are seven hundred and seventy migrations
